title: the Most Spookiest Time Of the Year
content: Photo by Marcel Kessler, via Flickr (https://www.flickr.com/photos/marcelkessler/) Fall has arrived, which heralds the arrival of that spookiest time of the year. As such, luminary is looking for "spooky autumn-themed short stories" for a yearly, um, ritual. What do you suggest?
author: Brandon Blatcher
